product_name: KT Tape Pro Therapeutic Tape - Precut
long_description: KT Tape Pro therapeutic tape has the tenacity to keep up with your active lifestyle. Wear it through multiple runs, daily showers or in the pool to bring relief to sore muscles and joints. Use Pro tape to help bring relief and support to common injuries such as knee pain, shin splints, plantar fasciitis, shoulder injuries, Achilles tendinitis and back pain. Pro tape has strong adhesive, and the synthetic core retains its elasticity far better over time than cotton kinesiology tape; Pro tape can be worn for 7 days per application. KT Tape Pro is 100% waterproof and sweatproof so it can be worn in the shower, pool and open water. No cutting required-includes twenty 10 in. x 2 in. precut strips. Reflective hits increase visibility in low light. Tape is latex free and gentle on skin. Includes instructions for applying tape to different areas on your body. KT Tape Pro therapeutic tape comes in a plastic carrying case. Different colors are for style preference.
short_description: KT Tape Pro therapeutic tape has the tenacity to keep up with your active lifestyle. Wear it through multiple runs, daily showers or in the pool to bring relief to sore muscles and joints.
